text: Smörgåsbord () is a type of Scandinavian meal. It comes from Sweden. It is a buffet-style meal with multiple hot and cold dishes. It is presented on open- face sandwiches. Smörgåsbord became well known at the 1939 New York World's Fair. It is usually a meal for celebrations. ==References== Category:Swedish food
title: Smörgåsbord
